input.sentences: as we walked through the entrance we saw the ferris wheel .
before going on any rides | i ate some salty food .
i felt sick so i put a towel over my face .
the sight of the ferris wheel made me sick | so i moved as far away as i could .
by the time i was far enough away | it was night .
output.sentences: We walked over to the ferris wheel at the fair.
Fairs are known for their salty food and fun rides.
The spinning ride made me sick and I had to put a cool towel on my face.
Even the sight of the spinning ferris wheel makes me sick.
The fun time to ride the rides is at night.
